instruction: Build a welcome speech for a college graduation ceremony.
output: Good morning everyone! It is an honor to welcome you all to today’s graduation ceremony - a momentous occasion that marks the end of our students’ years of hard work and dedication at this school. We ll take pride in all that has been achieved and all that is yet to come. On this special day, we congratulate our graduating students and offer them our best wishes for success in their future endeavors.
